content: Pausing for a moment on free cash flow, I’d like to point out again that operationally, this quarter was very similar to Q4 2021, which was a quarter where we posted positive free cash flow of $48 million. We did -- it’s in about the $3 million quantum because we -- the difference between 2.8% G&A rate and 4.6%, I think, which we think is our run rate, if you back out like that, it’s about a $3 million improvement in our G&A line.
